WorkItem.Description:
As in titile, for my and my bro rogues rawr 4.2.4 show very low mastery values like 0.16% (ilvl 363) and 0.06% (ilvl330), this can't be right...
Â 
EDIT: I forgot to add that I'm talking about combat spec, when i switch to assassination rawr evaluate mastery high (2.1), You can load any rogue and change its spec to combat, its seems that mastery is modeled wrong/broken for it.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Mastery for Combat is Very Undervaluated

Comments.Message: You will need to post the character's xml file.  Also, the rogue model is listed in the status as partially ready, so keep that in mind some things may no be working correctly yet.

I forgot to add that I'm talking about combat spec, when i switch to assassination rawr evaluate mastery high (2.1), You can load any rogue and change its spec to combat, its seems that mastery is modeled wrong/broken for it.
Rawr.Rogue undervaluing Mastery here, too. Showing ~0.1 DPS per mastery rating. Combat specced.

At first glance it seems it may be that the energy regeneration from Combat spec's Main Gauche may not be modeled to trigger Combat Potency, which it does.  The raw damage Main Gauche does appears to be correct.
